Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Cermak/Archer
ShortDescription: 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Archer, Canal and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Archer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Archer, Canal and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Archer.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Northbound Reroute near Racine/75th
ShortDescription: Northbound 44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 75th, Morgan, 74th and Racine: due to, street blockage near Racine/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 75th, Morgan, 74th and Racine: due to, street blockage near Racine/75th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Westbound #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute near Jefferson/Adams
ShortDescription: Westbound 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily near Jefferson/Adams.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Jefferson, Wacker, Madison, Canal, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Jefferson/Adams.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Eastbound #125 Water Tower Express Reroute near Jefferson/Adams
ShortDescription: Eastbound 125 Water Tower Express buses are temporarily rerouted near Jefferson/Adams.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #125 Water Tower Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Jefferson, Jackson, Wacker, Madison, Canal, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Jefferson/Adams.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train at Morgan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train at Morgan. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
